newsitem.title: FINLAND: PARTEK FINNISH H1 TRACTOR SALES UP 38 PCT.
newsitem.headline: PARTEK FINNISH H1 TRACTOR SALES UP 38 PCT.

text.p: Finnish cargo equipment, tractor and building materials group Partek Oy Ab said on Monday that domestic sales of its Valmet tractors rose 38 percent in January-June.
"Valmet tractor sales rose 38 percent, which means an increase of 444 tractors sold," Partek said in a statement.
Valmet's market share in January-June was 42 percent and June registrations gave a monthly record market share of 55 percent, it said.
"On the basis of the registration statistics, it is apparent that farmers' investments are shifting increasingly to domestic agricultural machinery," Partek said.
